lst.name: sentence
lst.str: First, in countries with large balance of payments surpluses such as Japan and West Germany, it threatened to hamper economic growth and thus slow down the expansion of real income and domestic expenditure necessary to wipe out surpluses.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: These chances "seem to me to rest critically on the expectation that the current configuration of interest rates, and the monetary policies behind them, will assure smooth financing of current account imbalances in the months ahead."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Board member Leonhard Gleske also told a Forex Association conference current exchange rates of major currencies "can be viewed as equilibrium levels in a medium-term perspective."
